UtTimingReporter

NoOp base class for assertion reporters. Specialize to determine how ut assert that will report success and failure.

Functions
add expression failure

To be used when test expr isn't actually an expression and the test fails to even start.

Parameters
label

any extra information about test

payload

any object which can used to send other information about the test (meaning negotiated between a family of assertions and reporters)

add failure

To be used when test expr fails to satisfy the test.

Parameters
label

any extra information about the test

test expr

object or expression under test

description

what was being tested

mismatch

why test expr failed to satisfy the test

lre

LRE value for the test

payload

any object which can used to send other information about the test

add unexpected throw

To be used when test expr doesn't get a chance to satisfy the test because a throw was unexpectedly encountered.

Parameters
label

any extra information about the test

test expr

object or expression under test

description

what was being tested

exception

the message from the unexpected throw

payload

any object which can used to send other information about the test

add success

To be used when a test fails (not much information currently needed)

Parameters
label

any extra information about test

test expr

object or expression under test

description

what was being tested

payload

any object which can used to send other information about the test

ut reporter

Factory for UtReporter.
